methods: abstract void addConnectionEventListener(ConnectionEventListener theListener) Registers the supplied ConnectionEventListener with this PooledConnection.
abstract void addStatementEventListener(StatementEventListener listener) Add a StatementEventListener to this PooledConnection object.
abstract void close() Closes the connection to the database held by this PooledConnection.
abstract Connection getConnection() Creates a connection to the database.
abstract void removeConnectionEventListener(ConnectionEventListener theListener) Unregisters the supplied ConnectionEventListener from this PooledConnection.
abstract void removeStatementEventListener(StatementEventListener listener) Remove a StatementEventListener from this PooledConnection object.
